metadata.title: CVE-2019-18604 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
In axohelp.c before 1.3 in axohelp in axodraw2 before 2.1.1b, asdistributed in TeXLive and other collections, sprintf is mishandled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-18604` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libkpathsea6 - 2020.20200327.54578-5
libptexenc1 - 2020.20200327.54578-5
libsynctex2 - 2020.20200327.54578-5
libtexlua53 - 2020.20200327.54578-5
libtexlua53-5 - 2020.20200327.54578-5
libtexluajit2 - 2020.20200327.54578-5
texlive-binaries - 2020.20200327.54578-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: texlive-bin package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2020.20200327.54578-5').
